GetServiceTemplateParameterConstraints.summary: Queries the constraints on the parameters in a Resource Orchestration Service (ROS) template in a region based on the template name and service ID.

schema.description: The region ID.
The service ID.
The service version.
The template name.
The configuration parameters of the service instance.

ParameterKey.description:
The name of the parameter. If you do not specify Parameters, the parameters and values in the template are used.

>  Parameters is an optional parameter. ParameterKey is required if you specify Parameters.

ParameterValue.description:
The parameter value that is defined in the template.

>  Parameters is an optional parameter. ParameterValue is required if you specify Parameters.

schema.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.
The region ID of the service instance.

The trial policy. Valid values:

*   Trial: Trials are supported.
*   NotTrial: Trials are not supported.
The name of the specification package.
The service instance ID.

Specifies whether to enable the private connection. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Type.description: The data type of the parameter.

AllowedValues.description: The valid values of the parameter.

items.description: The valid value of the parameter.

AssociationParameterNames.description: The names of the associated parameters.

items.description: The name of the associated parameter.

Behavior.description:
The behavior of the parameter. Valid values:

*   NoLimit: No limit is imposed on the value of this parameter.
*   NotSupport: The value of this parameter cannot be queried.
*   QueryError: This parameter failed to be queried.

>  If AllowedValues is not returned, Behavior and BehaviorReason are returned, which indicate the behavior of the parameter and the reason for the behavior.

BehaviorReason.description: The reason why the behavior of the parameter is returned.
BehaviorReason.example: No resource property refer to the parameter

AllowedValues.description: The valid values of the parameter.

items.description: The valid value of the parameter.

ResourceName.description: The name of the resource that is defined in the template.

QueryErrors.description: The error details that are returned if the request fails.

GetServiceTemplateParameterConstraints.title: GetServiceTemplateParameterConstraints

GetServiceEstimateCost.summary: Queries the estimated price for creating a service instance.

schema.description: The region ID.
The service ID.
The service version.

The name of the template. This parameter is returned only if you specify TemplateId.

> -   If you specify TemplateVersion, the name of the template whose version is specified by TemplateVersion is returned.
> -  If you not specify TemplateVersion, the name of the template whose version is the default version is returned.

The parameters that are specified for service instance deployment.

>  If you want to specify the region in which the service instance is deployed, you must specify the information in Parameters.

The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

The trial policy. Valid values:

*   Trial: Trials are supported.
*   NotTrial: Trials are not supported.
The package name.
The service instance ID.
The commodity details.

PayPeriodUnit.description:
The unit of the subscription duration. Valid values:

*   Year
*   Month
*   Day

schema.description: The name of the configuration update operation.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Schema of Response

GetServiceEstimateCost.title: GetServiceEstimateCost

GenerateServicePolicy.summary: Queries the missing policies before creating a service instance.

schema.description: The service ID.
The region ID.
The service version.
The name of the template.

The trial policy. Valid values:

*   Trial: Trials are supported.
*   NotTrial: Trials are not supported.

The type of operation N for which you want to generate the policy information.

Valid values:

*   CreateServiceInstance: creates a serviceInstance by calling the CreateServiceInstance operation.
*   UpdateServiceInstance: updates a serviceInstance by calling the UpdateServiceInstance operation.
*   DeleteServiceInstance: deletes a serviceInstance by calling the DeleteServiceInstance operation.

>  The default value is the combination of all valid values.

items.description:
The type of operation N for which you want to generate the policy information.

Valid values:

*   CreateServiceInstance: creates a serviceInstance by calling the CreateServiceInstance operation.
*   UpdateServiceInstance: updates a serviceInstance by calling the UpdateServiceInstance operation.
*   DeleteServiceInstance: deletes a serviceInstance by calling the DeleteServiceInstance operation.

>  The default value is the combination of all valid values.

Resource.description: The specific objects authorized. An asterisk (*) denotes all resources.

GenerateServicePolicy.title: GenerateServicePolicy

GetServiceProvisions.summary: Queries the information about the activation status and Resource Access Management (RAM) roles of the cloud services required by a service.

schema.description: The region ID.
The service ID.
The version of the service.
The template name.

The trial policy. Valid values:

*   Trial: Trials are supported.
*   NotTrial: Trials are not supported.
The parameters configured for the service instance.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Schema of Response

Status.description:
The activation status of the service. Valid values:

*   Enabled: The service is activated.
*   Disabled: The service is not activated.
*   Unknown: The activation status of the service is unknown.

AutoEnableService.description:
Indicates whether automatic activation for the service is defined in the template. Valid values:

*   true: Automatic activation for the service is defined in the template.
*   false: Manual activation for the service is defined in the template.

RoleProvision.description: The information about the RAM roles of the service. If this parameter is empty, no RAM role is associated with the service.

Roles.description: The RAM roles of the service.

items.description: The RAM roles of the service.

Created.description:
Indicates whether the RAM role is created. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Function.description: The purpose for which the RAM role is used. Default value: Default. A value of Default indicates that the RAM role is the default role of the service.

ApiForCreation.description: The information about the API operation that is used to create the RAM role.

ApiName.description: The name of the API operation.

ApiProductId.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud service to which the API operation belongs.

ApiType.description:
The type of the API operation. Valid values:

*   Open: public
*   Inner: private

parameters.description: The ROS parameters of the cluster.

AuthorizationURL.description:
The authorization URL of the RAM role.

> This parameter is returned if Created is set to false.

StatusReason.description:
The reason why the service is in the Disabled or Unknown state.

> This parameter is returned if Status is set to Disabled or Unknown.

EnableURL.description:
The URL that points to the activation page of the service.

> This parameter is returned if Status is set to Disabled.

GetServiceProvisions.title: GetServiceProvisions

Categories.description: The category list of the service.

schema.description:
The region ID. Valid values:

*   cn-hangzhou: China (Hangzhou).
*   ap-southeast-1: Singapore.
The serviceInstance name.
The service ID.
The service version.

The parameters that the customer specifies to deploy the service instance.

>  If region information is required to create a service instance, you must specify the region ID in the value of Parameters.

The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

Specifies whether the service instance supports the hosted O\&M feature. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**
The name of the template.
The operation metadata.

ServiceInstanceId.description: The ID of the service instance.

schema.description: The resource group ID.
The alert contact group.

The trial type of the service instance. Valid values:

*   **Trial**: Trials are supported.
*   **NotTrial**: Trials are not supported.
The tags.
The package name.

Specifies whether to perform only a dry run for the request to check information such as the permissions and instance status. Valid values:

*   **true**: performs a dry run for the request, but does not create a service instance.
*   **false**: performs a dry run for the request, and creates a service instance if the request passes the dry run.
Specification code.

Specifies whether to enable the Prometheus monitoring feature. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

The information about the order placed in Alibaba Cloud Marketplace. You do not need to specify this parameter if the service is not published in Alibaba Cloud Marketplace or uses the pay-as-you-go billing method.

PayPeriodUnit.description:
The unit of the subscription duration. Valid values:

*   **Year**
*   **Month**
*   **Day**

AutoRenew.description:
Specifies whether to enable auto-renewal for the service instance. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

AutoPay.description:
Specifies whether to automatically complete the payment. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

schema.description:
Specifies whether to automatically deduct the resource fees from the account balance. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

Status.description:
The status of the service instance. Valid values:

*   **Created**
*   **Deploying**
*   **DeployedFailed**
*   **Deployed**
*   **Upgrading**
*   **Deleting**
*   **Deleted**
*   **DeletedFailed**

CreateServiceInstance.title: CreateServiceInstance
CreateServiceInstance.summary: Creates and deploys a service instance.

GetServiceInstance.summary: Queries the information about a service instance based on the region ID and the ID of the service instance or the Alibaba Cloud Marketplace instance. Information including the service status, template name, and involved resources are returned.

schema.description:
The service instance ID.

>  You must specify either `ServiceInstanceId` or `MarketInstanceId`. Otherwise, the operation fails.
The region ID.
The MarketInstance ID.

Outputs.description:
The outputs returned from creating the service instance.

*   If the service is deployed by using a ROS template, all output fields of the template are returned.
*   If the service is deployed by calling an SPI operation, the output fields of the service provider and for the Compute Nest additional features are returned.

Status.description:
The deploy status of the serviceInstance. Valid values:
- Created
- Deploying
- DeployedFailed
- Deployed
- Upgrading
- Deleting
- Deleted
- DeletedFailed

UpdateTime.description: The time when the serviceInstance  was last updated.

Progress.description: The deployment progress of the service instance. Unit: percentage.

Parameters.description: The parameters configured for the service instance.

ServiceInstanceId.description: The ID of the service instance.

CreateTime.description: The time when the serviceInstance was created.

StatusDetail.description: The description of the deployment state of the service instance.

Service.description: The information about the service to which the service instance belongs.

Status.description:
The status of the service. Valid values:

*   Draft
*   Submited
*   Approved
*   Online
*   Offline
*   Deleted
*   Launching
*   Beta

PublishTime.description: The time when the service version was published.

DeployMetadata.description: The storage configurations of the service. The format in which the deployment information of a service is stored varies based on the deployment type of the service. In this case, the deployment information is stored in the JSON string format.

DeployType.description:
The deployment type of the service. Valid values:

*   ros: The service is deployed by using Resource Orchestration Service (ROS).
*   terraform: The service is deployed by using Terraform.
*   ack: The service is deployed by using Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK).
*   spi: The service is deployed by calling a service provider interface (SPI).
*   operation: The service is deployed by using a hosted O\&M service.

SupplierUrl.description: The URL of the service provider.

ServiceType.description:
The type of the service. Valid values:

*   private: The service is a private service and is deployed within the account of a customer.
*   managed: The service is a fully managed service and is deployed within the account of a service provider.
*   operation: The service is a hosted O\&M service.

SupplierName.description: The name of the service provider.

Locale.description: The language of the service instance.

Image.description: The URL of the service icon.

ShortDescription.example: B是A公司自主设计并研发的开源分布式的关系型数据库

VersionName.description: The custom version name defined by the service provider.

UpgradableServiceVersions.description: The service version that can be updated.

items.description: The service version that can be updated.

ServiceProductUrl.description: The URL of the service page.

ServiceDocUrl.description: The URL of the service documentation.

EnableInstanceOps.description:
Indicates whether the service instance supports the operation feature. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

IsOperated.description:
Indicates whether the hosted O\&M feature is enabled for the service instance. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

NetworkConfig.description:
The network configurations.

>  This parameter is discontinued.

EndpointId.description:
The ID of the endpoint for the private connection.

>  This parameter is discontinued.
The endpoint ID of the private connection.

PrivateZoneId.description: The ID of the private zone of the custom private domain name.

ConnectionConfigs.description: The network configurations, which are mainly used for private connections.

items.description: The network configurations, which are mainly used for the private connection.

VpcId.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC).

SecurityGroups.description: The names of the security groups.

items.description: The names of the security group.

IngressEndpointStatus.description:
The state of the ingress endpoint. Valid values:

*   Ready: The ingress endpoint is connected.
*   Pending: The ingress endpoint is being connected.
*   Failed: The ingress endpoint fails to be connected.
*   Deleted: The ingress endpoint is deleted.
*   Deleting: The ingress endpoint is being deleted.

NetworkServiceStatus.description:
The state of the network service. Valid values:

*   Ready: The network service is connected.
*   Pending: The network service is being connected.
*   Failed: The network service fails to be connected.
*   Deleted: The network service is deleted.
*   Deleting: The network service is being deleted.

EndpointIps.description: The IP addresses of the endpoints of the private connections.

items.description: The IP address of the endpoint of the private connection.

RegionId.description: The region ID of the VPC to which the endpoint of the private connection established based on the private network interconnection mode of Compute Nest belongs.

ConnectBandwidth.description: The bandwidth limit for the private connection established based on the private network interconnection mode of Compute Nest.

RegionId.description: The region ID of the endpoint of the PrivateLink connection.

ReversePrivateVpcConnections.description: The information about the reverse private connection.

items.description: The information about the reverse private connection.

EndpointId.description: The endpoint ID of the reverse private connection.

SupplierUid.description: The Alibaba Cloud account ID of the service provider.

EndTime.description: The expiration time of service instance.

Source.description:
The source of the serviceInstance. Valid values:
- User
- Market
- Supplier

ServiceType.description:
The type of the service. Valid values:

- private: The service is a private service and is deployed within the account of a customer.
- managed: The service is a fully managed service and is deployed within the account of a service provider.
- operation: The service is a hosted O&M service.

PayType.description:
The billing method of the instance for market. Valid values:

*   Permanent: Permanent purchase
*   Subscription: Subscription.
*   PayAsYouGo: Pay-as-you-go.
*   CustomFixTime: Merchant custom fixed duration.

Name.description: The name of the service instance.

BizStatus.description:
The business state of the service instance. Valid values:

*   Normal
*   Renewing
*   RenewFailed
*   Expired

GrafanaDashBoardUrl.description: The URL of the Grafana dashboard.

GetServiceInstance.title: GetServiceInstance

ContinueDeployServiceInstance.summary: Continues to deploy a service instance after the service instance failed to be deployed.

schema.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.
The ID of the service instance.
The region ID.
The parameters configured for the service instance.

Specifies whether to perform only a dry run for the request to check information such as the permissions and instance status. Valid values:

*   true: performs a dry run for the request, but does not create a service instance.
*   false: performs a dry run for the request, and creates a service instance if the request passes the dry run.
The options that the system adopts when the system continues to create the service instance.

items.description:
The option that the system adopts when the system continues to create the service instance. Valid values:

*   TryToFixSignalFailureByRerunEcsCommand: The system tries to fix existing signals of the FAILURE type. When ALIYUN::ROS::WaitCondition resources fail to be created, the system uses the associated and created ALIYUN::ECS::RunCommand and ALIYUN::ECS::Invocation resources and the relevant dependencies to recreate the ALIYUN::ROS::WaitCondition resources.
*   IgnoreExistingSignalFailure: The system ignores existing signals of the FAILURE type. If ALIYUN::ROS::WaitCondition resources fail to be created, the resources are successfully created when the system continues to create the service instance.
*   AutoRecreatingResources: The system automatically recreates the resources whose template content or referenced parameters are modified and the relevant dependencies. This option facilitates the configurations of RecreatingResources.N. However, unnecessary resources may also be recreated.

> This parameter takes effect only for ROS stacks.

ParametersNotAllowedToBeModified.description:
The parameters that cannot be modified. The operation that is performed to modify the parameters causes a validation error.

> This parameter is returned only if DryRun is set to true.

items.description:
The parameter that cannot be modified. The operation that is performed to modify the parameters causes a validation error.

> This parameter is returned only if DryRun is set to true.

ParametersConditionallyAllowedToBeModifi.description:
The parameters that can be modified under specific conditions. The new values of the parameters determine whether the operation that is performed to modify the parameters causes a validation error.

> This parameter is returned only if DryRun is set to true.

items.description:
The parameter that can be modified under specific conditions. The new values of the parameters determine whether the operation that is performed to modify the parameters causes a validation error.

> This parameter is returned only if DryRun is set to true.

ParametersAllowedToBeModified.description:
The parameters that can be modified. The operation that is performed to modify the parameters does not cause a validation error.

> This parameter is returned only if DryRun is set to true.

items.description:
The parameter that can be modified. The operation that is performed to modify the parameters does not cause a validation error.

> This parameter is returned only if DryRun is set to true.

ServiceInstanceId.description: The ID of the service instance.

ContinueDeployServiceInstance.title: ContinueDeployServiceInstance
ContinueDeployServiceInstance.description: This operation is available only for service instances that belong to private services deployed by using Resource Orchestration Service (ROS).

DeleteServiceInstances.summary: Deletes service instances based on the region ID and service instance IDs.

schema.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.
The region ID.
The IDs of the service instances.

DeleteServiceInstances.title: DeleteServiceInstances

ListServiceInstanceLogs.summary: Queries the deployment and upgrade logs of a service instance.

schema.description:
The region ID. Valid values:

*   cn-hangzhou: China (Hangzhou).
*   ap-southeast-1: Singapore.
The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 20.
A pagination token. It can be used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. If NextToken is empty, no next page exists.
The ID of the service instance.

The log source. Valid values:

*   computeNest (default): logs of the deployment and upgrade of the service instance.
*   application: logs generated by the application.
* actionTrail: the action trail logs.
The Logstore. You must specify this parameter if you set LogSource to application.
The filter.

Value.description: The parameter value N of the filter. Valid values of N: 1 to 10.

items.description: A value of the filter condition.
items.example:
- StartTime: 2024-07-01T02:41:20Z
- EndTime: 2024-07-01T02:41:20Z
- EventName: DeleteInstance
- ResourceName: i-bp1dgfcx8vl4w9m7a1st
- ApplicationGroupName: groupA

Name.description:
The parameter name of the filter. You can specify one or more parameter names to query services. Valid values:

- StartTime: Query by the start time of the ActionTrail event.
- EndTime: Query by the end time of the ActionTrail event.
- EventName: Query by the name of the ActionTrail event.
- ResourceName: Query by the name of the resource associated with the ActionTrail event.
- ApplicationGroupName: Query by the name of the application group with the ActionTrail event.

NextToken.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results.

MaxResults.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 20.

ServiceInstancesLogs.description: The logs of the service instance.

Timestamp.description: The timestamp of the service instance log.

Source.description:
The source of the service instance log. Valid values:

*   computeNest: The log is generated by Compute Nest.
* application: logs generated by the application.
* actionTrail: the action trail logs.

LogType.description:
The log type. Valid values:

*   serviceInstance: log generated by the service instance.
*   resource: log generated by ROS resources.

Status.description:
The state of the service instance. Valid values:

*   Creating: The service instance is being created.
*   Created: The service instance is created.
*   Deploying: The service instance is being deployed.
*   Deployed: The service instance is deployed.
*   DeployedFailed: The service instance failed to be deployed.
*   Expired: The service instance expired.
*   ExtendSuccess: The service instance is renewed.
*   Upgrading: The service instance is being updated.
*   UpgradeSuccess: The service instance is updated.

ListServiceInstanceLogs.title: ListServiceInstanceLogs

ListServiceInstanceResources.summary: Queries the resources involved in a service instance that meet specific conditions. Request parameters include the service instance ID, Aliyun Resource Names (ARNs) of resources, and region ID.

schema.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 20.

The token that determines the start point of the next query. Valid values:

*   If **NextToken** is not returned, it indicates that no additional results exist.
*   If **NextToken** was returned in the previous query, specify the value to obtain the next set of results.
The ID of the service instance.
The Alibaba Cloud Resource Name (ARN) of a resource.

items.description: The Alibaba Cloud Resource Name (ARN) of a resource.

schema.description: The tag key and value.

Start time of resource usage. 
<notice>Note: Only supports querying service instances on private deployments.></notice>

End time of resource usage. 
<notice>Note: Only supports querying service instances on private deployments.></notice>

The billing method of the read-only instance. Valid values:

*   **Postpaid**: pay-as-you-go
*   **Prepaid**: subscription

The region ID. Valid values:

*   cn-hangzhou: China (Hangzhou).
*   ap-southeast-1: Singapore.
Service Instance resource type，include AliyunResource and ContainerResource.

The filter conditions. Vaild values:

- ExpireTimeStart：
Query start time for Subscription resource expiration.
<notice>Notice Note: Only supports querying service instances on private deployments.><notice>

- ExpireTimeEnd：Query end time for Subscription resource expiration.
<notice>Notice Note: Only supports querying service instances on private deployments.><notice>

- PayType：The billing method of the read-only instance. 
<notice>Notice Note: Only supports querying service instances on private deployments.<notice> 

   Valid values:

   - PayAsYouGo

   - Subscription

- ResourceARN：The Alibaba Cloud Resource Name (ARN) of a resource.

Name.description:
Vaild values:
- ExpireTimeStart
- ExpireTimeEnd
- PayType
- ResourceARN

Values.description: The value of the filter condition.

items.description: The value that you want to match in the filter.

MaxResults.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 20.

PayType.description:
The billing method. Valid values:

*   Subscription
*   PayAsYouGo

RenewStatus.description:
The renewal state. Valid values:

*   AutoRenewal
*   ManualRenewal
*   NotRenewal

CreateTime.description: The time when the resource was created.

ExpireTime.description: The time when the resource expires.

RenewalPeriodUnit.description:
The unit of the renewal period. Valid values:

*   Month
*   Year

ProductType.description: The type of the cloud service.

ProductCode.description: The code of the cloud service.

Status.description:
The state of the resource. Valid values:

*   running
*   waiting
*   terminated

>  This parameter is returned only for containers.

ListServiceInstanceResources.title: ListServiceInstanceResources

schema.description: The region ID.
The number of entries page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 20.

The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request. You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.
The filter.

Value.description: The parameter values of the filter.

items.description: The parameter value N of the filter. Valid values of N: 1 to 10.

Name.description:
The parameter name of the filter. You can specify one or more parameter names to query services. Valid values:

- Name：Query by service name.
- ServiceInstanceName：Query by service  instance name.
- ServiceInstanceId：Query by service  instance ID.
- ServiceId：Query by service ID.
- Version：Query by service version.
- Status：Query by service status.
- DeployType: Query by service deployType.
- ServiceType：Query by service deployType.

schema.description: The tag key and value.
The resource group ID.

TotalCount.description: The total number of entries returned.

MaxResults.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 20.

ServiceInstances.description: The information about the service instances.

Name.description: The name of the service instance.

Status.description:
The state of the service instance. Valid values:

*   Created
*   Deploying
*   DeployedFailed
*   Deployed
*   Upgrading
*   Deleting
*   Deleted
*   DeletedFailed

Outputs.description: The information returned after the service instance is created.

UpdateTime.description: The time when the service instance was updated.

Parameters.description: The parameters of the service instance.

CreateTime.description: The time when the service instance was created.

StatusDetail.description: The description of the deployment of the service instance.

Progress.description: The deployment progress of the service instance, in percentage.

OperatedServiceInstanceId.description: The ID of the managed service instance.

PublishTime.description: The time when the service was published.

DeployType.description:
The deployment type of the service. Valid values:

*   ros: The service is deployed by using Resource Orchestration Service (ROS).
*   terraform: The service is deployed by using Terraform.
*   ack: The service is deployed by using Alibaba Cloud Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK).
*   spi: The service is deployed by calling the Service Provider Interface (SPI).
*   operation: The service is deployed by using a hosted O\&M service.

SupplierUrl.description: The URL of the service provider.

ServiceType.description:
The type of the service. Valid values:

*   private: The service is a private service and is deployed within the account of a customer.
*   managed: The service is a fully managed service and is deployed within the account of a service provider.
*   operation: The service is a hosted O\&M service.

SupplierName.description: The name of the service provider.

Locale.description: The language of the service instance.

Image.description: The URL of the service icon.

ShortDescription.example: B是A公司自主设计并研发的开源分布式的关系型数据库

VersionName.description: The custom version name defined by the service provider.

SaasBoostMetadata.description: The configuration metadata related to SaaS Boost.
SaasBoostMetadata.example: { // Specifies whether to associate the service with the SaaS Boost commodity. Default value: false. "Enabled":true/false // The public endpoint of the SaaS Boost instance. "PublicAccessUrl":"https://example.com" }

Type.description:
The platform type. Valid values:

*   marketplace: Alibaba Cloud Marketplace.
*   Css: Lingxiao.
*   SaasBoost: SaaS Boost.

OperationStartTime.description: The beginning of the time range during which hosted O\&M is implemented.

OperationEndTime.description: The end of the time range during which hosted O\&M is implemented.

EnableInstanceOps.description:
Indicates whether the service instance supports the hosted O\&M feature. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

Source.description: The source from which the service instance is created.

EndTime.description: The time when the service instance expires.

ServiceType.description:
The type of the service. Valid values:

*   private: The service is a private service and is deployed within the account of a customer.
*   managed: The service is a fully managed service and is deployed within the account of a service provider.
*   operation: The service is a hosted O\&M service.
*   poc: The service is a trial service.

PayType.description:
The billing method. Valid values:

*   Permanent: Once you purchase the service, you can use it permanently.
*   Subscription: You purchase the service from Alibaba Cloud Marketplace and are charged for the service on a subscription basis.
*   PayAsYouGo: You purchase the service from Alibaba Cloud Marketplace and are charged for the service on a pay-as-you-go basis.
*   CustomFixTime: You are charged for the service based on a custom duration fixed by the service provider.

MarketInstanceId.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud Marketplace instance.

BizStatus.description:
The business state of the service instance. Valid values:

*   Normal
*   Renewing
*   RenewFailed
*   Expired

ListServiceInstances.title: ListServiceInstances
ListServiceInstances.summary: Queries a list of service instances in a region within the current account. Request parameters include the region ID and resource ID.

StartServiceInstance.summary: Starts a service instance that is in the Stopped or StartFailed state.

schema.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.
The region ID where the service instance resides.
The ID of the service instance.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: Schema of Response

StopServiceInstance.summary: Stops a service instance that is in the Deployed or StopFailed state.

schema.description:

You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters.

The ID of the service instance.

schema.description:

You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

RestartServiceInstance.title: RestartServiceInstance

schema.description: The service instance ID.
The name of the specification package.
The configuration parameters of the service instance.

Specifies whether to perform only a dry run for the request to check information such as the permissions and instance status. Valid values:

*   **true: performs a dry run for the request, but does not create a service instance.**
*   **false: performs a dry run for the request, and creates a service instance if the request passes the dry run.**

Specifies whether to enable Prometheus on the customer side. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**
The name of the configuration update operation.

The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

The information about the order placed in Alibaba Cloud Marketplace. You do not need to specify this parameter if the service is not published in Alibaba Cloud Marketplace or uses the pay-as-you-go billing method.

AutoPay.description:
Specifies whether to automatically complete the payment. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**
